Warrior.shortDescription: You are a courageous soul driven by purpose and protection.
Warrior.fullReport: As the Warrior, your cosmic path is one of bravery, strength, and leading by example. You inspire others through your determination and commitment to justice.

Seeker.shortDescription: You are drawn to the mysteries of the universe.
Seeker.fullReport: As the Seeker, your journey involves deep exploration and spiritual discovery. Your gift lies in asking the right questions and walking the path of inner knowing.

Sage.shortDescription: You seek truth and offer clarity to others.
Sage.fullReport: As the Sage, your cosmic role is to transmit divine wisdom. You are the lighthouse in the dark, guiding others through understanding and sacred knowledge.

Creator.shortDescription: You birth beauty and meaning into existence.
Creator.fullReport: As the Creator, your purpose is to shape the world with vision and art. Your essence brings forth healing, transformation, and inspiration.
